personality.backstory: Once a knight in service to a distant kingdom, Marcus failed to protect his lord during a surprise attack. He now serves as a village guard, trying to redeem himself by protecting common folk.
personality.motivation: To never fail to protect someone again, and to prove he deserves a second chance.
quirks: Constantly scans the surroundings for threats
Stands at attention even during casual conversation
Keeps count of how many he's protected (currently 147)

hidden_agenda.short_term_goal: Train villagers and travelers in basic combat
hidden_agenda.long_term_goal: Return to face the enemies who killed his lord and seek justice
hidden_agenda.secret: His lord survived and is actually looking for him, wanting to thank him for his sacrifice
reveal_conditions: Player proves themselves in combat against raiders
Player shows honor by protecting the defenseless
After helping Marcus with village defense missions

behavior.farewell_style: offers tactical advice for the road ahead

speech_style.vocabulary: military, direct, with occasional chivalric phrases
speech_style.sentence_length: short and precise, like giving orders
common_phrases: Stay alert. Danger can strike at any moment.
I've seen what happens when people let their guard down.
